explains: adj. 促进的，[物] 加速的；催化的
wordGroup: accelerating agent 促进剂；促染剂

sentences.en: Worse, the numbers are now falling at an accelerating rate.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是，这些数据现在正在加速下降。

sentences.en: It becomes a breakdown process where everything ends up accelerating until it's all gone.
sentences.cn: 它变成了一个崩溃的过程——所有的东西都在加速，直到消失。

sentences.en: Our managerial skills are measured by the competence manifested in accelerating this process.
sentences.cn: 我们的管理技能是以在加速这一进程中表现出来的能力来衡量的。
